description: Try our easy to follow Football Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Football Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 2 tbs reserved frosting with cocoa. Transfer to a snaplock bag and snip off the corner. Pipe a line along the centre of the ball for the seam. Transfer remaining white frosting to a snap-lock bag and pipe laces on top of football. Refrigerate for 10 minutes to set. Serve.
